title: Yamamoto's 2nd straight CG sparks Dodgers in G2
content: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched a four-hitter for his second consecutive complete game, the first in the World Series since 2015, and the Los Angeles Dodgers defeated the Toronto Blue Jays 5-1 Saturday night, tying the best-of-seven matchup at one game apiece.

title: 8-0 Aggies empty Tiger Stadium with rout of LSU
content: Texas A&M coach Mike Elko said he isn't worried about the program's decades of underachievement and is focused on the 2025 Aggies, who are 8-0 after beating LSU 49-25 on Saturday.

title: Sources: Manning concussed in Texas' OT win
content: Backup Matthew Caldwell threw a scoring pass to Emmett Mosley V in OT after starter Arch Manning was knocked out of the game with an injury, and No. 22 Texas came back to defeat Mississippi State 45-38 on Saturday, improving to 6-2 (3-1 in the SEC).

title: NFL looks into Ravens for Lamar practice status
content: The NFL will investigate the Baltimore Ravens' handling of quarterback Lamar Jackson's practice participation, which led to the two-time NFL Most Valuable Player being ruled out because of a hamstring injury for Sunday's contest against the Chicago Bears.

title: Sources: Titans open to deal, won't trade stars
content: The Titans are open to dealing ahead of the NFL trade deadline, but are unwilling to part with Cam Ward or Jeffery Simmons, sources told ESPN.

title: Jones, Pereira call for fight at White House event
content: Jon Jones and Alex Pereira both stated Saturday they would like to face up against each other at the White House event slated for June.

title: üòè Ole Miss' jab at Oklahoma leads Week 9 trolls
content: The Rebels boosted their College Football Playoff hopes in a major way with a big win in Norman, Oklahoma.

title: Takeaways from Dodgers' series-tying win over Blue Jays
content: After Toronto rolled in the opener, Los Angeles rebounded to even the Fall Classic. Here's how it went down.

content: Updated inactives and analysis based on the latest reports and official announcements leading up to kickoff.

title: Last-minute pickups: Who are the best options?
content: If this heavy bye week or injuries have you seeking lineup help, we have available options to consider.

title: Catch up with our last-minute predictions, fantasy sleepers, more
content: Big game for Derrick Henry? Alec Pierce's first TD of the season? More fantasy upside for Joe Flacco? Here's what to know for Week 8.

title: Mbapp√© vs. Yamal is the new Ronaldo vs. Messi -- so which Clasico star is better?
content: Not since Messi vs. Ronaldo has the Barcelona-Real Madrid rivalry given us a matchup like Yamal vs. Mbappe. So, which superstar would you rather have?

title: Madrid vs. Bar√ßa head-to-head, form, key clashes, predictions, odds
content: When Real Madrid and Barcelona face off, there's nothing bigger happening anywhere in the soccer world.

title: UFC 321 takeaways: Heavyweight division still in ruins after Aspinall-Gane disaster
content: After a promising start to the UFC 321 headliner, an eye poke kept the heavyweight division in turmoil.

title: X-ray tables, marked cards and the Mafia: How the FBI says poker games were rigged
content: Details of how poker games, some involving Chauncey Billups, were allegedly rigged to make people lose big.

title: VAR review: Should Man United have had a penalty vs. Brighton?
content: Amad Diallo ran into the Brighton area, drawing Maxim De Cuyper into making a challenge. But was it a penalty?

title: Stoppage-time goals in the Premier League are out of control
content: The PL is renowned for delivering late drama, but stoppage-time goals have reached a whole new level.

title: Last season's good times for Liverpool feel a million miles away
content: Mo Salah is a shadow of himself, Arne Slot looks bereft of ideas, and Liverpool have now lost as many league games as they did in the entirety of last season.

title: Man United finally have momentum to fuel greater aspirations
content: Nothing comes easy for Man United, but Ruben Amorim's side still found a way to extend its winning run vs. Brighton.

title: Thamel: Five questions that will define a wild CFB coaching carousel
content: Big-money buyouts, big-name candidates and more coaches under pressure. Let's break down college football's biggest coaching questions.

title: Lando Norris gets dream Mexico pole: Max P5, Piastri P8
content: Lando Norris gave a significant boost to his championship chances by taking pole position for the Mexican Grand Prix while his title rivals qualified in fifth and eighth, respectively.

title: WWE 'SmackDown' highlights: McIntyre heats up title match against Rhodes
content: Friday's "SmackDown" set up a perfect "Saturday Night's Main Event," with Drew McIntyre and Cody Rhodes ready for the challenge.

title: NFC East roundtable: Can the defending champs take the division crown again?
content: So far, every team in the NFC East except the Eagles has played three division games. Here's how they stack up.

title: Giants-Eagles rivalry and the punt that lives in NFL infamy
content: DeSean Jackson and Matt Dodge relive a 15-year-old shank and a walk-off return that fans will never forget.

title: NBA intel: Wemby's new game plan, and early concerns for Lakers and Rockets
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst take the pulse of the league after a thrilling first few nights of 2025-26.

title: Steelers' 1933 striped throwbacks, Chargers' navy look top NFL Week 8 uniforms
content: It's the debut of a throwback uniform for the Steelers in Week 8, while the Eagles will also be wearing kelly green.

title: NFL Week 8's fashionable arrivals, featuring Justin Jefferson
content: From suits to streetwear, Week 8's arrivals mixed personal flair and cold-weather layers with comfort and creativity.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Greenwood-Rashford reunion
content: Barcelona scouts are keeping tabs on Marseille striker Mason Greenwood. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: US-China trade talks: Scott Bessent says 'substantial framework' reached
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced a substantial framework to prevent 100% tariffs on Chinese goods and defer rare earths export controls. High-level talks in Kuala Lumpur preceded this development, aiming for more balanced trade, agricultural purchases, and fentanyl crisis measures. The framework is expected to be finalized by Presidents Trump and Xi.

title: 'Not at India's expense': Rubio's big remark on US-Pakistan ties - here's what he said
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio stated that strengthening ties with Pakistan will not compromise the "deep, historic, and important" partnership with India. He emphasized a pragmatic foreign policy, highlighting a long history of counterterrorism cooperation with Pakistan and the desire to expand it.

title: 'Birth-based ruling class': Dynasts lead candidate lists in Bihar polls
content: In a region where political awareness runs deep despite limited economic and educational progress, dynastic influence remains an unbroken thread. As Bihar heads into assembly elections, the hold of family-based politics spans parties and ideologies alike ‚Äî from the RJD to the BJP ‚Äî reflecting how lineage continues to shape leadership in one of India‚Äôs most politically conscious states.

title: Pan-India SIR: EC to hold presser on Monday evening; may appoint volunteers for Bengal
content: The Election Commission of India will announce a pan-India Special Intensive Revision of voters' lists on October 27. This exercise, expected to cover 10-15 states including those with 2026 Assembly elections, may involve volunteers assisting Booth Level Officers in West Bengal. The revision could lead to an increase of approximately 14,000 polling booths in the state.

title: GM layoffs: Engineers fired on Microsoft Teams; Says it's business, not you
content: General Motors has let go of over 200 salaried employees, mainly CAD engineers, at its Michigan tech campus. This move, part of a restructuring to boost profits, follows strong third-quarter earnings and a raised financial outlook. GM stated the layoffs target execution roles to enhance core design capabilities. This comes as the automotive sector sees broader workforce reductions.

title: 'One last time‚Ä¶ signing off' - Rohit drops bombshell on social media
content: Rohit Sharma's cryptic social media post after the ODI series against Australia has sparked speculation about his future. Despite India's loss, Sharma's unbeaten 121 in the final match, his 50th international century, showcased his enduring class. He expressed his love for playing in Australia and the importance of mentoring younger players.

title: Katy Perry & Justin Trudeau confirm romance, make first public appearance in Paris
content: Pop star Katy Perry and former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau have confirmed their relationship. The couple made their first public appearance hand-in-hand in Paris. They were seen exiting a cabaret show after celebrating Perry's birthday. Paparazzi and fans captured their affectionate moments. This outing follows earlier sightings of the couple together.

title: From tweet to Tesla HQ: How Ashok Elluswamy was hired; Musk shares backstory
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk revealed that a single social media post in 2015 led to the hiring of Ashok Elluswamy, now head of Autopilot and AI. This unconventional approach, where Musk directly solicited applications via email, was instrumental in building Tesla's AI team organically from scratch, a strategy he credits for the company's growth and innovations.

title: Explained: How Mark Carney is trying to reassure Canadians after Trump‚Äôs tariff threats
content: Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney is projecting calm after US President Donald Trump imposed a 10% tariff hike on Canadian imports, triggered by a provincial ad.  Carney aims to reassure Canadians and signal to the US that Ottawa won't be bullied, while emphasizing trade diversification towards Asia and preparing for a new budget.

title: Hailee Steinfeld reveals 11pm emergency therapy call while Josh Allen faces Bills' slump
content: Actress Hailee Steinfeld candidly shared her struggles with career and relationship pressures, detailing a late-night therapy session prompted by doubts about balancing ambitions. Her personal newsletter, Beau Society, now on Substack, offers fans intimate insights. Meanwhile, her husband, NFL star Josh Allen, aims to lead the Buffalo Bills back to winning ways amidst their own public scrutiny.

title: GitHub is in trouble from AI; Gates complained, Nadella agrees
content: Microsoft is revamping GitHub to tackle AI coding rivals like Cursor and Claude Code. CEO Satya Nadella highlighted the need to unify development tools, drawing parallels to Bill Gates' past vision.  The platform aims to integrate AI across all developer workflows, ensuring choice in models and surfaces to regain developer mindshare.

title: 6 years after receiving arrears, retired employees told to repay - until this SC ruling
content: The Supreme Court has ruled in favor of five retired Odisha judiciary employees, quashing a demand to repay salary arrears received six years prior. The apex court stated that surplus payments cannot be reclaimed from employees if they were not involved in fraud or misrepresentation, emphasizing equity and preventing undue hardship.

title: Explained: Why PM's Bihar campaign start is a calculated political move
content: Prime Minister Modi launched the NDA's Bihar campaign in Mithilanchal, strategically invoking Karpoori Thakur's legacy to appeal to the Extremely Backward Classes (EBCs). This region, with its significant electoral weight and volatile voting patterns, is crucial for the NDA's path to power. Development projects and cultural pride are also key elements of their outreach.

title: Satish Shah‚Äôs final moments: ‚ÄòEk niwala khaye, phir collapse ...‚Äô
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, 74, passed away on October 25 due to kidney failure, leaving fans and colleagues in mourning. His manager revealed he collapsed during his last meal. Shah had undergone a kidney transplant a few months prior but had appeared to be recovering.

title: Skidded bike, panicked driver: How events unfolded in Kurnool bus fire
content: A tragic bus accident near Kurnool claimed 19 lives after a bus collided with a motorcycle. The pillion rider recounted how the bike skidded, leading to the fatal crash. The bus driver stated he was driving at 80-90 kmph and couldn't avoid the bike, later attempting to rescue passengers.

title: Asean Summit: 'Not just trade but cultural partners,' says PM Modi - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi highlighted ASEAN's significance as a "main pillar" of India's Act East Policy during the 47th ASEAN Summit. He emphasized shared geography, culture, and values, stating India and ASEAN are not just trade but also cultural partners.

title: Emiru‚ÄìMizkif controversy: Breakup sparks assault and legal claims
content: Twitch streamer Emiru publicly accused ex-boyfriend Mizkif of sexual assault, emotional abuse, stalking, and blackmail threats. She detailed disturbing past threats and a new warning sign at TwitchCon 2025, prompting her to speak out for her safety. Mizkif admitted to toxic fights but denied assault, while Emiru is pursuing restraining orders.

title: Coldplay frontman Chris Martin dating Sophie Turner after split from Dakota Johnson: Reports
content: Reports suggest a new romance between 'Game of Thrones' star Sophie Turner and Coldplay's Chris Martin, following their recent breakups. The duo was reportedly spotted on a secret London date. Turner, a known Coldplay fan, and Martin, currently in London for tour dates, are said to have connected after their respective splits. Neither has confirmed the burgeoning dating rumors.

title: India under Gambhir - What's the success rate with and without Virat & Rohit?
content: Gautam Gambhir's coaching tenure has seen India achieve a 67.9% win rate across 53 matches. While the team performs at 50% with veterans Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, a young brigade has secured an impressive 83% win rate in their absence, showcasing a strong transition under the new coach's leadership.

title: Satish Shah funeral: Rupali Ganguly, Ratna Pathak & more pay tribute
content: The Indian entertainment industry mourns the sudden passing of veteran actor Satish Shah, aged 74, due to kidney failure. Known for his iconic role in 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai' and numerous films, Shah's demise has left colleagues and fans deeply saddened. Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Anupam Kher were among those who paid heartfelt tributes to the beloved actor.

title: Did Trump hit bull‚Äôs eye with tariffs? Why India, China may stop buying Russian oil ‚Äî explained
content: US President Donald Trump's sanctions on Russia's Rosneft and Lukoil may compel India and China to halt crude imports. While tariffs proved insufficient, these sanctions block financial transactions, making trade nearly impossible.

title: ‚ÄòDrunk drivers are terrorists‚Äô: Hyderabad top cop on Kurnool bus fire that killed 20
content: Hyderabad Police Commissioner VC Sajjanar declared drunk drivers as terrorists following a tragic bus fire that killed 20 people in Kurnool. He emphasized that the incident, caused by an intoxicated biker, was a preventable massacre, not an accident. Sajjanar vowed a zero-tolerance approach to drunk driving in Hyderabad, stating such acts will be punished as crimes.

title: Satish Shah‚Äôs funeral: Sarabhai vs Sarabhai cast bids emotional goodbye; sings iconic title track
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah passed away at 74. The cast of Sarabhai vs Sarabhai gathered for an emotional farewell. Rupali Ganguly, Sumeet Raghavan, and others sang the show's title track. They remembered Shah as a father figure. JD Majethia shared his shock and grief. Shah had recently undergone a kidney transplant.

title: 'Greed for power': Tejashwi counters Chirag Paswan's 'no Muslim CM' charge; questions his 'vision'
content: Tejashwi Yadav accused Chirag Paswan of power greed, claiming he compromised his political stand by joining the ruling alliance. Yadav's remarks followed Paswan's accusation that the RJD opposed a Muslim chief minister in 2005 and continues to do so, urging minority communities to reconsider their loyalty.

title: IND vs AUS: Explosive! Rohit Sharma‚Äôs coach reveals when he plans to retire
content: Rohit Sharma silenced critics with an outstanding ODI series against Australia, scoring 202 runs at an average of 101 and earning Player of the Series. His childhood coach revealed Sharma's ambition to play until the 2027 World Cup, showcasing his enduring self-belief and contribution to the team.

title: Man‚Äôs Rolex seized at airport; HC gives relief‚Äî how customs rules apply to luxury items
content: A Dubai-based Indian traveller successfully challenged Customs at Delhi High Court after his luxury Rolex watch was wrongly classified as commercial goods. The court ruled a single high-value watch isn't automatically for trade, allowing its redemption with a fine. This clarifies that while high-value personal items need declaration, mere possession doesn't imply commercial intent.

title: 'Ro-Ko' turn back the clock, script their own ending Down Under
content: On a golden Sydney evening, two men who have defined Indian cricket for over a decade found themselves writing the perfect epilogue. Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma ‚Äî both long retired from Tests and T20Is ‚Äî walked out one last time in blue on Australian soil. The result wasn‚Äôt just a win; it was a resurrection ‚Äî a poetic reminder that their story, even now, isn‚Äôt done.

title: Pancreatic cancer: 4 early signs often mistaken for common ailments
content: The journal Cancers (2020) published research, which demonstrated that weight loss and anorexia (loss of appetite), occur frequently during the early stages of pancreatic cancer, because of tumor-related complications and pancreatic inflammation

title: Trump at Asean: US and Malaysia sign major trade agreement; more deals in process
content: President Trump solidified a significant trade pact with Malaysia and witnessed a historic peace accord between Cambodia and Thailand during his ASEAN Summit visit. He emphasized America's commitment to a free and open Indo-Pacific, highlighting new trade deals and robust economic growth.

title: UP horror: Woman forced into 2 abortions; sexually abused by in-laws over male child demand
content: A Kanpur woman alleges she was subjected to severe abuse, including forced abortions and sexual assault, by her husband's family due to their desire for a male heir. After giving birth to a daughter, she was allegedly forced into two abortions following illegal sex determination tests. The harassment escalated, leading to her expulsion from the home.

title: After sitting out Sydney ODI, Arshdeep makes hilarious post - Watch
content: While sidelined from the third ODI against Australia, Indian pacer Arshdeep Singh entertained fans with a humorous video from a moving truck, joking about his career path. The reel, showcasing his jovial nature, went viral. Despite missing the match, Arshdeep remains the series' most economical bowler, highlighting his off-field charm and on-field prowess.

title: Allowance hike, pension & more: INDIA bloc‚Äôs poll promises for ‚Äònew Bihar‚Äô; perks for Panchayat heads
content: RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav announced welfare measures for Bihar's Panchayati Raj representatives if the INDIA bloc wins the upcoming elections. Promises include increased PDS distributor margins, pension schemes, and a Rs 50 lakh insurance cover for Panchayat and Gram Kachari representatives. Yadav urged voters to give the INDIA bloc 20 months to bring about change in Bihar.

title: IIT Kharagpur non-JEE admissions: Olympiad, sports achievers eligible; check others
content: IIT Kharagpur is opening doors for Olympiad winners and national/international sports medalists, allowing admission without JEE ranks from 2026. This initiative, inspired by other IITs, aims to diversify talent and recognize achievements beyond traditional exams. New pathways, SCOPE and SEA, will be introduced, integrating with JoSAA for national-level talent recognition.

title: Shocking! Is Rohit to blame for Gill‚Äôs ODI struggles? Ex-India selector speaks out
content: Shubman Gill's recent struggles in white-ball cricket, marked by a low run tally in Australia and the Asia Cup, have drawn scrutiny. Experts attribute his dip in form to an extensive workload, captaincy pressures, and the challenge of replacing Rohit Sharma, all impacting his batting performance.

title: PPF rules: Why Kerala HC asked a mother to return extra interest in kids‚Äô accounts - Explained
content: The Kerala High Court has ruled that deposits in minor children's PPF accounts are combined with the guardian's account for annual deposit limits. Excess interest earned on these over-limit deposits made while the children were minors can be lawfully recovered by the Post Office, clarifying deposit clubbing rules.

title: 'SoS, there‚Äôs a guy following us‚Äô: 2 Australian cricketers molested; accused tried to grab one
content: Two Australian cricketers were allegedly stalked and molested by a man in Indore while walking to a cafe. The accused, Akil Khan, was arrested after CCTV footage and a complaint from the team's security manager. The incident occurred near the team hotel, prompting an investigation into security protocols. The Australian team did not comment on the matter post-match.

title: Satish Shah's demise: Rupali Ganguly gets emotional
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, renowned for his role as Indravadhan in 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai', passed away at 74 due to kidney failure. His co-stars from the iconic show gathered to pay their respects, remembering him as a father figure whose off-screen bond mirrored his on-screen chemistry.

title: 'People are waiting for Virat, Rohit to fail': Ex-India cricketer‚Äôs shocking claim
content: Former cricketer Mohammad Kaif defends Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, suggesting selectors await their failure for ODI removal before the 2027 World Cup.  He highlighted their match-winning partnership in Sydney, proving their enduring class and determination to depart on their own terms. Kaif stressed their vital experience on South Africa's challenging pitches, deeming them indispensable.

title: Nina Lin apologizes after viral clip resurfaces of Said trying to escape livestream
content: Twitch streamers Nina Lin and Zoe Spencer have had their channels suspended after an old livestream resurfaced, showing them twerking on a visibly uncomfortable FaZe Silky's assistant, Said. Lin apologized, admitting she was wrong and that Said was clearly hurt, but faced backlash for the delayed response. Viewers are demanding fair treatment and accountability from Twitch.

title: Mann Ki Baat: PM lauds Chhath, Op Sindoor success; highlights environmental initiatives
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, in his 'Mann Ki Baat' address, highlighted Chhath Puja as a symbol of social unity and praised the armed forces' success in Operation Sindoor. He also lauded environmental initiatives like the 'Garbage Caf√©' and mangrove plantations, encouraging the adoption of Indian dog breeds and remembering Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel.

title: Trump praises Asim Munir, Shehbaz Sharif; vows to end Pakistan-Afghanistan conflict
content: US President Trump praised Pakistani leaders and vowed to quickly resolve the Pakistan-Afghanistan conflict, claiming his administration has ended eight wars in eight months. He expressed confidence in his ability to mediate peace, stating he can save millions of lives. India, however, maintains no third-party mediation was involved in its ceasefire understanding with Pakistan.

title: Retirement? Ravi Shastri panics after Virat Kohli‚Äôs one-word reply - Watch
content: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's stellar partnership prevented a series whitewash in Australia, with Rohit scoring an unbeaten 121 and Kohli 74 not out. Their unbroken 168-run stand guided India to a nine-wicket victory. The duo expressed gratitude for their experiences playing in Australia, highlighting their enduring chemistry and the lessons learned throughout their careers.

title: Clamour for lower premium for MEDISEP unrealistic, say experts
content: They say in a State like Kerala where health seeking behaviour is high, leading to a high utilisation of health insurance cover, it would not be viable for any insurance company to run a comprehensive health insurance scheme at lower premiums

title: Unexplained kidney disease emerging as major health concern in Telangana, study finds
content: Conducted between March 2021 and November 2022 at Osmania General Hospital, it was a single-centre, prospective observational study designed to document the clinical and epidemiological risk profile of CKDu patients in Telangana and to assess their kidney histology

title: Chittoor district braces for cyclone Montha
content: Collector orders the identification of vulnerable areas, old and dilapidated buildings, and safe shelters for evacuation, if needed

title: Thiruvananthapuram airport sees 22% increase in flights during winter schedule
content: Thiruvananthapuram airport will handle 732 weekly air traffic movements, up from 600 in the summer schedule.

title: CESL to open mega tender for procuring electric buses on November 6
content: The tender covers five metropolitan cities, and is aimed at giving a push to India‚Äôs clean mobility drive

title: Stalin presents ‚Çπ25 lakh each to kabaddi players Karthika and Abinesh
content: The players had recently returned from Bahrain, where they were part of the kabaddi teams that won gold medals in the 3rd Asian Youth Games

title: Reveal facts on Google Data Centre‚Äôs job potential, environmental impact, CPI(M) urges Andhra Pradesh government
content: With IT Minister Lokesh claiming that the facility will create 1.80 lakh jobs and Union Minister Pemmasani Chandrasekhar putting the figure at not more than 6,000, and environmentalists warning of adverse impact, there is a need for the government to clear the air, says party State secretary Srinivasa Rao

title: ECI likely to announce on pan-India SIR of voters list on October 27: Officials
content: While complete details were still awaited, the poll authority is likely to announce the first phase of SIR in which 10 to 15 states will be covered, including those going to Assembly polls in 2026.

title: Warden of Bengaluru central prison caught smuggling mobile phone for inmate
content: The 29-year-old accused is allegedly suspected to have helped inmates to smuggle contrabands inside the prison for a price even earlier.

title: Bengaluru senior citizen seeks cyber probe into fake ‚Äòcash on delivery‚Äô parcel scam
content: Police said that the company is suspected to have sourced the data and addresses from social media, and randomly sends parcels to people to sell their product and cheat them.

title: Direct flights between Kolkata, China's Guangzhou to resume on October 26
content: The first flight is scheduled to leave Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport at 10 p.m. today, an official said

title: Scheduled Caste man beaten to death in Madhya Pradesh‚Äôs Bhind, kin torch house of accused
content: The victim's death led to tensions in village, as his relatives and other residents vandalised a house belonging to one of the accused

title: Directory on Punnapra-Vayalar struggle fighters to be released on October 27
content: Directory includes information on 1,859 participants of the Punnapra-Vayalar struggle, says Thomas Isaac.

title: Businessman wanted in Kerala‚Äôs Jawahar Nagar real-estate grab case nabbed from Chennai
content: A plainclothes crime squad arrested Anil Thampi in the case concerning the illegal acquisition and subsequent sale of an expansive mansion on prime land at the upscale residential locality in Thiruvananthapuram

title: Ranji Trophy match attracts cricket lovers to KSCA stadium in Shivamogga
content: Shivamogga city is hosting a Ranji Trophy match after a gap of five years. The last match, between Karnataka and Madhya Pradesh, was held in January 2020.

title: 21 Maoists surrender in Chhattisgarh‚Äôs Kanker; hand over 18 weapons, including AK-47s
content: They laid down arms under 'Poona Margem: Rehabilitation through Reintegration' initiative started by Bastar Range police, the official added.

title: 21st century belongs to India and ASEAN, PM Modi says at Kuala Lumpur summit
content: ‚Äú2026 will be the year of ASEAN-India maritime cooperation,‚Äù PM Modi said in his 6-minute long virtual address

title: Equal work, unequal wages: pay gap persists for gig workers in India
content: The report by workforce staffing services and HR Solutions provider is based on a Digipoll survey among 1,550 professionals across industries during September 1-30, 2025

title: Poll arrangements for 2025 Kerala local body elections: State Election Commission to meet political parties on October 29
content: National and State-level parties can send one representative each to the meeting, which will be held in Thiruvananthapuram

title: Authorities rescue four bonded labourers from a farm in Dharwad
content: The rescued workers are from Chindwara district in Madhya Pradesh and were hired for sugarcane harvesting in Maharashtra by paying an advance of ‚Çπ5,000 each. They were then brought to Lingadakoppa to work as farm labourers.

title: Kerala joined PM SHRI scheme only to access Central funds, says Thomas Isaac
content: Differences of opinion within the Left Democratic Front will be discussed and resolved, says the former Finance Minister

title: Chikkamagaluru police arrest two, recover valuables worth ‚Çπ32 lakh
content: According to Chikkamagaluru SP Vikram Amathe the arrested are part of infamous Chaddi gang of thieves

title: Red, orange alerts for 23 Andhra Pradesh districts for October 27 as cyclone ‚ÄòMontha‚Äô looms
content: The deep depression over southeast Bay of Bengal, formed at 5.30 a.m. on Sunday (October 26), moved west-northwestwards with a speed of six kmph

title: Three-phase power across Sarvepalli with ‚Çπ95 crore soon in A.P., says MLA Somireddy
content: The Sarvepalli MLA said that the transformation into three-phase would be completed in a couple of months and a shed built under the BOT system has an installed capacity to repair more than 100 transformers a month

title: Every rupee spent on judicial infrastructure will strengthen public confidence: Justice Surya Kant
content: He inaugurated a renovated 126-year-old heritage building which once housed the Madras Law College but had now been annexed to the Madras High Court

title: Government identifying land for shifting Karnataka High Court to new location within Bengaluru‚Äôs CBD area: D.K. Shivakumar
content: With no scope for expansion in existing building adjacent to Cubbon Park, Advocates‚Äô Association seeking modern building at new location

title: U.K. evinces interest in India's e-courts project; delegation to meet top law ministry officials
content: Under the ongoing phase three of the project, a total of 3,108 crore documents will be digitised, and the system will be migrated to a cloud technology

title: 95% of Kerala‚Äôs Alappuzha‚ÄìChanganassery road work completed
content: Almost all major works have been finished, except for Pallathuruthy bridge, which is expected¬†to be completed in the next couple of months. Project aims to prevent  flooding of AC road during monsoon season

title: Cyclone Montha: Minister directs officials to instil confidence among public
content: The Minister wanted special attention to be paid to the Chejerla, Ananta Sagaram and Sangam mandals, which are abutting the Penna River and hence prone to breaches

title: India-EU FTA talks intensify, Piyush Goyal set to meet his counterpart in Brussels
content: Even as the Commerce Minister visits Brussels, a delegation from the European Parliament will visit New Delhi to explore FTA issues.

title: Hanle protects its dark skies and builds a future on stargazing
content: With the motto ‚Äòcome for the mountains, stay for the stars‚Äô, the Hanle Dark Sky Reserve is showing how the Himalayan skies are being preserved today and will be carried forward for future generations, while also lending a helping hand to the local economy

title: Woman passenger arrested at Hyderabad airport with ‚Çπ4.15 crore worth of hydroponic weed
content: The Directorate of Revenue Intelligence officers intercepted the woman passenger who had arrived from Bangkok on the intervening night of October 24 and 25 and took her into custody

title: Shinde wanted Uddhav-Raj rapprochement before Shiv Sena split, claims Raut
content: In his weekly column 'Rokthok' in the Sena (UBT) mouthpiece 'Saamana', Sanjay Raut said Eknath Shinde is unhappy now that the Thackeray cousins have come together

title: Job Mela in Tirupati aims to boost employment for youth
content: A Job Mela in Srikalahasti ‚Äî a part of Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs goal of creating 20 lakh jobs for youth ‚Äî on October 25 connected 312 candidates with 15 companies, resulting in 163 job offers

title: Cyclone Montha: Epidemic cells formed at district and State levels, vaccines kept ready
content: All doctors and paramedical staff are instructed to be available 24/7 to the public at all health centres until the cyclone situation improves in Andhra Pradesh

title: Captured elephant ‚ÄòRadhakrishnan‚Äô released in Kalakkad Mudanthurai Tiger Reserve
content: The elephant has been fitted with a radio collar and a team of staff from the forest department will monitor its movements

title: India to host four-day Asia-Pacific aircraft accident investigators meet from October 28
content: Around 90 aircraft accident investigators are expected to participate in the Asia-Pacific Accident Investigation Group, says officials

title: AI Minister "Pregnant" With "83 Children": Albania PM's Bizarre Announcement
content: Albania's AI-generated minister, Diella, is "pregnant," Prime Minister Edi Rama has announced. He revealed plans to create "83 children", or assistants, one for each Socialist Party member of parliament.

title: 'Broken Their Backbone': Rebels Claim Seizure Of Key Sudan Army Base
content: Sudan's paramilitary Rapid Support Forces said Sunday they had seized the army headquarters in El-Fasher, the last major urban centre in the western Darfur region outside their control.

title: Man Strangles Wife At Delhi Home, Stages It As A Suicide. Then Calls The Cops
content: A man allegedly killed his wife at their Delhi home and then called the police, claiming the woman died by suicide.

title: Adani Ports To Showcase Blue Economy Leadership At India Maritime Week
content: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd (APSEZ), India's largest port developer and operator, is set to showcase its role in shaping the nation's Blue Economy at the ensuing India Maritime Week (IMW) 2025.

title: BJP vs Opposition Over Ex-MP's Mention In Maharashtra Doctor's Suicide Note
content: The death by suicide of a woman doctor in Satara district has set off a political uproar in Maharashtra, with the opposition demanding a high-level probe and accusing the state government of shielding influential figures.

title: Nation In Mourning: Thailand Honours Queen Sirikit With Year-Long Farewell
content: Thousands of grieving Thai royalists lined the streets of Bangkok on Sunday, saluting a procession bringing former queen Sirikit's body to lie in state for a year-long funeral at the capital's Grand Palace.

title: Netanyahu Says Israel Needs 'No Approval' To Defend Itself
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warned Sunday that Israel would seek no approval to strike targets in Gaza or Lebanon, despite agreeing to ceasefires.

title: After Nearly 5 Years, Model Jailed By Yemen's Houthi Rebels Walks Free
content: Yemen's Houthi rebels have released model Entisar al-Hammadi after holding her in prison for nearly five years, her lawyer and a security source told AFP on Sunday.

title: Madras High Court Recognises Cryptocurrency As Property Under Indian Law
content: In a significant ruling, the Madras High Court has held that cryptocurrency qualifies as "property" under Indian law, an asset capable of being owned, enjoyed, and held in trust.

title: 21 Maoists, Including 13 Women, Surrender With 18 Weapons In Chhattisgarh
content: As many as 21 Maoist cadres surrendered in Chhattisgarh's Kanker district on Sunday after handing over 18 weapons to authorities, a police official said.

title: Ahead Of Polls, Bihar Buzzes Over Rahul Gandhi's Long Absence
content: The political heat in Bihar is at its peak. From village chaupals to crowded tea stalls in Patna, one question dominates every conversation: Who will win this time.

title: 3 Dead, 29 Wounded In Kyiv After Russia Strikes Ukrainian Capital
content: Russia targeted Ukraine's capital with drones, killing three people in their homes, authorities said early Sunday.

title: PM Modi Declares 2026 As ASEAN-India Year Of Maritime Cooperation
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi noted that the cooperation between India and ASEAN is growing rapidly in Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief, maritime security and blue economy and declared 2026 as 'ASEAN-India Year of Maritime Cooperation.'

title: "JD Vance's Wife Isn't Muslim": Trump Ally's Shocker To Journalist
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer is at a war of words with journalist Mehdi Hasan over comments made by US Vice President JD Vance about New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani.

title: Odisha On High Alert As Deep Depression Intensifies In Bay Of Bengal
content: The Odisha government on Sunday put all 30 districts on alert as the depression in the Bay of Bengal has intensified into a deep depression and is slowly moving towards the east coast, officials said.

title: From Coorg To Koraput: PM Modi Praises States Driving Indian Coffee Success
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said Indian coffee is gaining popularity globally, driven by the diverse varieties grown in states, including Karnataka, Tamil Nadu and Kerala.

title: Jharkhand Officials Suspended As 5 Test HIV-Positive After Blood Transfusion
content: Jharkhand Chief Minister Hemant Soren on Sunday ordered the suspension of West Singhbum district Civil Surgeon and other concerned officials after five children suffering from thalassemia tested HIV-positive following blood transfusions.

title: Trump Says He Will "Solve" Afghanistan-Pakistan Crisis "Very Quickly"
content: US President Donald Trump said Sunday he will solve the Afghanistan-Pakistan crisis "very quickly," as peace talks between the warring neighbours entered a second day.

title: Kremlin Warns Of 'Overwhelming' Response To Strikes Deep Inside Russia
content: Russian armed forces will respond forcefully in the event of strikes deep inside Russia, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said in remarks published on Sunday.

title: China, US Reach 'Preliminary Consensus' On Trade Ahead Of Trump-Xi Talks
content: China has reached a "preliminary consensus" in its trade negotiations with the United States, a top Beijing official said in Malaysia on Sunday, days ahead of high-stakes talks between their leaders.
